subject: ControlUp alert mail - Process Started -  Process 3764 on DESDN01058 (SoapServer.exe)
body:

     Process name: SoapServer.exe <controlup://incidents/SoapServer.exe> 


     Process ID: 3764


     User name: BITZER\s00228 <controlup://incidents/BITZER\s00228> 


     Session ID: 0


     Computer name: DESDN01058 <controlup://incidents/DESDN01058> 


     Incident timestamp (UTC +2 W. Europe Standard Time): 8/27/2025 9:04:00 AM



In order to configure which e-mail alerts you receive, please open ControlUp and edit the settings for the trigger specified above.
